ceo_buyer.justification: Forrestania Resources’ Chairman John Hannaford commented: “We are pleased to announce the revised terms for the Option agreement over both the Bonnie Vale and Breakaway Dam projects.

interest_acquired_percent.justification: The documents describe an option agreement to acquire tenements but do not specify the percentage of interest being acquired. It is implied to be 100% of the tenements, but this is not explicitly stated.

currency.justification: The consideration is listed in '$' and the acquiring company, Forrestania Resources Ltd, is listed on the ASX (ASX: FRS), implying Australian Dollars (AUD).

cash_payments_raw.justification: The project's share is $50,000, calculated as half of the $100,000 cash payment shared between the Bonnie Vale and Breakaway Dam projects, as stated in the text: 'Payment of $100,000 cash upon exercise.' and 'The option covers 2 project areas (~210km2 in area): Bonnie Vale (E15/1632 & E15/1534) and Breakaway Dam (E29/1036 & E29/1037).'

share_payments_raw.justification: The project's share is $550,000, calculated as half of the $1.1m share consideration shared between the Bonnie Vale and Breakaway Dam projects, as stated in the text: 'Deferral of the $1.1m share consideration payable up until May 2026.' and 'The option covers 2 project areas (~210km2 in area): Bonnie Vale (E15/1632 & E15/1534) and Breakaway Dam (E29/1036 & E29/1037).'

cash_and_share_payments_combined_raw.justification: Separate cash and share payment values were provided, so this field is null as per the financial data extraction hierarchy.

amount_of_shares_issued.justification: A raw share payment value was provided, so this field is null as per the financial data extraction hierarchy. The number of shares is also not yet determined, as it is based on a future VWAP: 'the Company may issue the $1.1 million of share consideration at any time, up until 5th May 2026, based on a 5 day VWAP share price at the time...'

issued_share_price.justification: A raw share payment value was provided, so this field is null as per the financial data extraction hierarchy. The share price is also not yet determined, as it is based on a future VWAP.

exploration_commitment_meters.justification: No exploration commitment in meters was mentioned in the documents.

exploration_commitment_value_raw.justification: No specific monetary value for an exploration commitment was mentioned in the documents.

exploration_commitment_desc.justification: No specific exploration commitment was described in the documents.

nsr_acquired_percent.justification: No Net Smelter Royalty (NSR) or Gross Revenue Royalty (GRR) was mentioned as part of the transaction terms.

coverage_area_raw.justification: The Bonnie Vale project area is one of the largest continuous tenements (~90km2) within the Coolgardie region

coverage_area_unit.justification: The Bonnie Vale project area is one of the largest continuous tenements (~90km2) within the Coolgardie region

resource_size.justification: The document explicitly states that the data is not sufficient for a resource estimate: 'At this stage, the data is not being used to create a mineral resource, further drilling will be required.'

buyer_ticker_and_exchange.justification: Forrestania Resources Limited (ASX: FRS) (“FRS” or “the Company”) is pleased to announce that it has agreed to revised terms for the option agreement with Outback Minerals Pty Ltd for the Bonnie Vale and Breakaway Dam projects.
